definition: with considerable certainty, within the realm of credibility
details:
adverb
- with considerable certainty
= synonyms: probably
adjective
- within the realm of credibility
= example: within the realm of credibility
- has a good chance of being the case or of coming about
= example: has a good chance of being the case or of coming about
- likely but not certain to be or become true or real
= example: likely but not certain to be or become true or real
= synonyms: probable
- expected to become or be
= synonyms: potential
